overview: By merging a passion for new and emerging technologies with professional experience and member of the American Institute of Architects (AIA), Michael has become recognized as an expert in the area of the user’s experience of consumer technology. He actively pursues the developing trend of integrating cutting-edge technology into the social experience, encompassing both the physical spaces we inhabit and the virtual/social media world. Available to consult both established brands and start-ups, Michael provides access to his unique knowledge and insights in addition to services as product evangelist. Michael has appeared as the featured interview on IdeaMensch.com and was selected as a judge for the Innovations Design and Engineering Awards at the 2011 Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas.
